mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPT_TITLE, A.STU_ID, C.STU_NAME, C.STU_STATUS, A.ATTENDANCE, A.ASSIGNMENT, A.MIDEXAM, A.FINEXAM, (A.ATTENDANCE + A.ASSIGNMENT + A.MIDEXAM + A.FINEXAM) AS GRADE_TOTAL, A.GRADE_RESULT, A.GRADE_CREDIT FROM GRADE A JOIN LECT_REGISTER B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE JOIN STUDENT C ON A.STU_ID=C.STU_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE JOIN SUBJECT E ON A.SUB_CODE=E.SUB_CODE WHERE SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND GRADE_YEAR=#{gradeYear} AND GRADE_SEMESTER=${gradeSemester} ORDER BY STU_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GRA_OBJECT A JOIN STUDENT B ON A.STU_ID=B.STU_ID JOIN GRADE C ON A.GRADE_NO=C.GRADE_NO JOIN SUBJECT D ON D.SUB_CODE=C.SUB_CODE WHERE D.PROF_ID=#{profId}

SELECT B.STU_NAME, A.TITLE, A.GRA_OBJ_DATE, A.STATUS FROM GRA_OBJECT A JOIN STUDENT B ON A.STU_ID=B.STU_ID JOIN GRADE C ON A.GRADE_NO=C.GRADE_NO JOIN SUBJECT D ON D.SUB_CODE=C.SUB_CODE WHERE D.PROF_ID=#{profId} ORDER BY GRA_OBJ_NO DESC
